metadata.title: CVE-2023-4762 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Type Confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.179 allowed aremote attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
